desc: Organic and natural skincare inspired by the Caribbean. Made in small batches for optimal potency. Organic cocoa butter, made with botanical oils, shea butter and enriched with vitamin E oil. Hibiscus facial mist with soothing aloe vera, rosewater and cucumber extract. Deeply moisturising skincare.

layout.text: Protecting parched skin, cuticles and nails, this rich formula leaves hands intensely moisturised with a lingering frangipani aroma.
